comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: I like to look at the t.me/Bitcoin Telegram Channel from time to time. It compiles all of the latest articles published by most news sources (Bitcoin magazine, Decrypto, CoinTelegraph, Coindesk etc) into one place. It's easy to keep up with the headlines and also to dig deeper into the articles you are interested in. The Press board (as others suggested) is also a fine resource. I find that it relies mostly on what users find and isn't as "real-time" as the telegram channel though. Another fine resources is TradingView. It covers a limited amount of sources, though it usually has 5-10 new articles per day. One thing in common about all sources is that it should all be taken with a grain of salt. Some articles ring 100% true, some articles are complete garbage, other articles are in between. Take all news as entertainment until you identify authors/sources that you have proven are accurate from your own reading and experience. BitcoinMagazine is one of my personal favorites.
